# Retrospective: [Prototype Name]

**Phase:** Design | Build | Test | Review
**Date:** YYYY-MM-DD

---

## What Worked Well
What clearly moved the prototype forward.

## What Didn't Work
Friction, dead ends, wrong assumptions.

## Key Learnings
Transferable insights beyond this prototype.

## Invalidated Assumptions
What we believed that turned out false.

## Signals We Misread or Ignored
Data or feedback we discounted or over-weighted.

## Bias Check
- [ ] Novelty bias?
- [ ] Over-optimizing edge cases?
- [ ] Recency bias?
- [ ] Personal preference bias?

## Would Do Differently
Concrete changes if repeating the experiment.
